name: The Secret Life of a Slime [Extended]
name_original: The Secret Life of a Slime [Extended]
description:
You are a slime and you have awoken in the human world. 

Your energy is depleting by the second and it's up to you to stay alive. 

Question is, how long can you survive?

KeyFunctionArrow keysMove
ZInteractEnterSelect menu option
EInventorySSkip tutorial
